name: Garden Carnival
description:
Garden Carnival is a new matching puzzle game!
Switch and swap, match 3 crops, run your garden club, challenge crops disease, face lava threat, collect coconuts- all with strategic matching!
Garden Carnival is an all-new matching puzzle filled with mixed crops madness!
It's a fruity season! Crops grow in your garden!
---------- Highlighted Features ----------
1 Unlock Fall adventure as you matching through your garden!
2 Magical garden club is waiting for you! Great rewards are prepared!
3 Eye-catching graphics and animations which will bring you into the story-driven adventure!
4 Rechargeable boosters, well-designed power-ups help with those challenging levels.
5 100+ of well-designed free levels! Free levels and game modes added regularly!
5 Facebook connected, easy to share with your friends.
6 Easy and fun to play, yet challenging to fully master: all with strategic swiping!
---------- How to Play -----------
1 Switch and match 3 or more crops to reach the target.
2 Unlock power-ups, collect coins, run your garden club for the preparation of tough levels.
3 Less moves you pass a level, higher score you'll get. Can you score high enough to earn 3 stars on every level?
4 Garden Carnival is completely free to play but some in-game items may require payment.
